scenario.name: Basic UAS responder
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 401 Unauthorized [last_Via:];received=1.1.1.1;rport=1111 [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] WWW-Authenticate: digest realm="test" Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:];received=1.1.1.1;rport=1111 [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Contact:] Subject: Reregister due to IP change, this has two Contacts Content-Length: 0
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:];received=2.2.2.2;rport=2222 [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Contact:] Subject: Refresh, got IP change again Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:];received=2.2.2.2;rport=2222 [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Contact:] Subject: Reregister due to IP change to 2.2.2.2, this has two Contacts Content-Length: 0
